image:image.image:title: Seeing the World: A Beginner's Guide to CNNs using PyTorch
image:image.image:caption: Learn the fundamentals of Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) using PyTorch. A beginner-friendly introduction to how machines see images.

image:image.image:title: Deta Surf: Reclaim Your Digital World
image:image.image:caption: Explore how a new browser is rethinking the way we organize our digital lives using AI, local-first principles, and spatial design.

image:image.image:title: A no nonsense guide to UV (a Python Package Manager)
image:image.image:caption: A fast, modern, all-in-one Python package manager that simplifies dependency management, environments, and Python versions.

image:image.image:title: The Reason pip Suddenly Refuses to Install Globally
image:image.image:caption: We will discuss Python Enhancement Proposal 668, specifically the error regarding externally managed environments, and elaborate on its benefits.
